WorkItem.ClosedComment: Same issue as 14480 marked as fixed by Astrylian
WorkItem.Description:
When I trying to update item cache from Wowhead, I got some errors with some items in the process. I checked update for English and Russian languages and got the same.
 
This is the first item with error on the screenshot.
 
"Index was outside the bounds of the array"
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Index was outside the bounds of the array

Comments.Message: It is _not_ "russian armory" issue. It is "english wowhead" issue. Please, look at screenshot.
This *may* be the same as 14480, there was an index outside of bounds of the array error, and was fixed for the next version.
Well, I tried to update that specific item and it worked just fine for English.  Whatever the problem was, it isn't happening anymore (or you need to provide more details on how to reproduce it)

EBS the problem is identical to the one I posted as issue 14480. Its a source issue where the source is a vendor. I've alerted Astrylian to the issue by MSN as it is repeatable for myself for any item that is vendor purchase, eg: Tier 9 gear.
